gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.job
Interface JobSchedulerProvider

All Superinterfaces:
ResourceWrapper
All Known Implementing Classes:
QuartzJobSchedulerProviderImpl
public interface JobSchedulerProvider
extends ResourceWrapper

Means to schedule jobs in a unit of work. This resource wrapper is enListed to the current transaction and the jobs are fired using the JobScheduler provided by this provider only if the commit succeeds. The jobs are cleared after they are fired or in case of a rollback.

Method Summary
 void clearJobs()
          Clears all scheduled jobs.
 List<JobDescription> getScheduledJobs()
           
 JobScheduler getScheduler()
          Gets the scheduler that will be used to submit all scheduled jobs to the underlying scheduling implementation.
 void scheduleJob(JobDescription job)
          API users use this to schedule a job to be executed after the end of the current unit of work.
 
Methods inherited from interface gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.ResourceWrapper
close
 

Method Detail

getScheduler

JobScheduler getScheduler()
Gets the scheduler that will be used to submit all scheduled jobs to the underlying scheduling implementation. This method is for internal use only and is not part of the public API.

Returns:
Returns the scheduler

scheduleJob

void scheduleJob(JobDescription job)
API users use this to schedule a job to be executed after the end of the current unit of work.

Parameters:
job -

getScheduledJobs

List<JobDescription> getScheduledJobs()
Returns:
Returns all scheduled jobs

clearJobs

void clearJobs()
Clears all scheduled jobs. Again, this is not meant for API users.
